rules: Rule1: If a flood is detected in the basement, then it is not the case that the admin override is active.

Rule2: Whenever a storm is approaching, then provided that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, an emergency call is made.
Rule3: If vacation mode is active, then whenever it is night time, either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room results in the alarm not being triggered by the system.
Rule4: Provided that test mode is active, if it is night time, then either a pet is inside the house or furniture being moved in the living room causes the alarm not to be triggered by the system.
Rule5: In the event that maintenance is scheduled for the system, either vacation mode is active or test mode is active.
Rule6: If the entry door is open, then motion is detected by the sensor.
Rule7: The entry door is open or the living room window is open.
Rule8: Whenever the living room window is open, the alarm is not triggered by the system.
Rule9: Under the condition that the surveillance camera is active, the system is in an armed status.
Rule10: In the event that a fire is detected in the kitchen, it is not the case that the admin override is active.
Rule11: If it is not the case that the system being powered on implies the surveillance camera is active, then the admin override is active.
Rule12: Provided that it is not the case that either a fire is detected in the kitchen or a flood is detected in the basement, the system is manually disabled.

Rule13: In the event that it is not the case that the absence of either a fire detected in the kitchen or a flood detected in the basement implies the system is not manually disabled, it is not the case that an emergency call is made.
Rule14: Provided that it is not the case that the system not being armed implies the employee is authorized for access, the alarm is triggered by the system.
facts: Fact1: A storm is approaching according to the weather report.
Fact2: Furniture has been moved in the living room.
Fact4: Maintenance is scheduled for the system.
Fact5: The system is powered on.
Fact6: It is not the case that the employee is authorized for access.
Fact7: A pet is not inside the house.
Fact8: Motion is not detected by the sensor.

question: The system is in an armed status.
